params._token: The address of the ERC20 token to enable.

params._user: The address to add to the blacklist.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the owner to the message sender.

params._owner: Address of the initial owner of the registry contract.

params._user: The address to remove from the blacklist.

params._token: The address of the ERC20 token to disable.

params._accountRecovery: The new address of the AccountRecovery module contract to be used.

params._adminManager: The new address of the AdminManager contract to be used.

params._escrowFixedPrice: The new address of the EscrowFixedPrice contract to be used.

params._escrowHourly: The new address of the EscrowHourly contract to be used.

params._escrowMilestone: The new address of the EscrowMilestone contract to be used.

params._factory: The new address of the Factory contract to be used.

params._feeManager: The new address of the FeeManager contract to be used.

NATIVE_TOKEN().notice: Constant for the native token of the chain.

accountRecovery().notice: Address of the account recovery module contract.

addPaymentToken(address).notice: Adds a new ERC20 token to the list of accepted payment tokens.

addToBlacklist(address).notice: Adds an address to the blacklist.

adminManager().notice: Address of the admin manager contract.

blacklist(address).notice: Checks if an address is blacklisted.

escrowFixedPrice().notice: Address of the escrow fixed price contract currently in use.

escrowHourly().notice: Address of the escrow hourly contract currently in use.

escrowMilestone().notice: Address of the escrow milestone contract currently in use.

factory().notice: Address of the factory contract currently in use.

feeManager().notice: Address of the fee manager contract currently in use.

paymentTokens(address).notice: Mapping of ERC20 token addresses that are enabled as payment options.

removeFromBlacklist(address).notice: Removes an address from the blacklist.

removePaymentToken(address).notice: Removes an ERC20 token from the list of accepted payment tokens.

setAccountRecovery(address).notice: Updates the address of the account recovery module contract.

setAdminManager(address).notice: Updates the address of the admin manager contract.

setTreasury(address).notice: Sets the treasury address where collected fees and other payments will be sent.

treasury().notice: Address of the treasury where fees and other payments are collected.

updateEscrowFixedPrice(address).notice: Updates the address of the escrow fixed price contract.

updateEscrowHourly(address).notice: Updates the address of the escrow hourly contract.

updateEscrowMilestone(address).notice: Updates the address of the escrow milestone contract.

updateFactory(address).notice: Updates the address of the factory contract.

updateFeeManager(address).notice: Updates the address of the fee manager contract.

documentation.text:
@notice Constant for the native token of the chain.
 @dev Used to represent the native blockchain currency in payment tokens mapping.
@notice Address of the escrow fixed price contract currently in use.
@notice Address of the escrow milestone contract currently in use.
@notice Address of the escrow hourly contract currently in use.

@notice Address of the factory contract currently in use.
 @dev This can be updated by the owner as new versions of the Factory contract are deployed.

@notice Address of the fee manager contract currently in use.
 @dev This can be updated by the owner as new versions of the FeeManager contract are deployed.
@notice Address of the treasury where fees and other payments are collected.
@notice Address of the account recovery module contract.
@notice Address of the admin manager contract.

@notice Mapping of ERC20 token addresses that are enabled as payment options.
 @dev Includes the ability to enable the native chain token for payments.

@notice Checks if an address is blacklisted.
 @dev Stores addresses that are blacklisted from participating in transactions.

@dev Initializes the contract setting the owner to the message sender.
 @param _owner Address of the initial owner of the registry contract.

@notice Adds a new ERC20 token to the list of accepted payment tokens.
 @param _token The address of the ERC20 token to enable.

@notice Removes an ERC20 token from the list of accepted payment tokens.
 @param _token The address of the ERC20 token to disable.

@notice Updates the address of the escrow fixed price contract.
 @param _escrowFixedPrice The new address of the EscrowFixedPrice contract to be used.

@notice Updates the address of the escrow milestone contract.
 @param _escrowMilestone The new address of the EscrowMilestone contract to be used.

@notice Updates the address of the escrow hourly contract.
 @param _escrowHourly The new address of the EscrowHourly contract to be used.

@notice Updates the address of the factory contract.
 @param _factory The new address of the Factory contract to be used.

@notice Updates the address of the fee manager contract.
 @param _feeManager The new address of the FeeManager contract to be used.

@notice Sets the treasury address where collected fees and other payments will be sent.
 @param _treasury New treasury address.

@notice Updates the address of the account recovery module contract.
 @param _accountRecovery The new address of the AccountRecovery module contract to be used.

@notice Updates the address of the admin manager contract.
 @param _adminManager The new address of the AdminManager contract to be used.

@notice Adds an address to the blacklist.
 @param _user The address to add to the blacklist.

@notice Removes an address from the blacklist.
 @param _user The address to remove from the blacklist.

@title EscrowRegistry Contract
 @dev This contract manages configuration settings for the escrow system including approved payment tokens.
